on reading compounds: 麹菌【コウジキン】koji mold (Aspergillus oryzae)
麹塵【キクジン】yellow-green tinged with grey, emperor's informal robes
kun reading compounds: 麹【こうじ】kōji, malted rice, malt, malt-like material from growing mold on rice, barley, beans, etc. (used as a starter to make sake, miso, soy sauce, etc.)
麹黴【こうじかび】koji mold (Aspergillus oryzae)
塩麹【しおこうじ】salted kōji (traditional condiment)
